resources.string: Note:\nDo not close this window while in verification process. If you have problem in verifying, create a new account with different username.
After a successful reset of your account, please check your email for verification code.
Confirmation code has been sent to your registered email. Please enter the confirmation code and a new strong password.
Plug in the device and wait until the LED blinks red and green.
Tip: Keep your phone close to the device throughout the setup.
LED not blinking red and green?\nPress and hold the reset button until the LED blinks red.
Password reset success, check your email
This mobile application is interconnected to the PPE detection system wherein it can detect the utilization and absence of hard hats, glasses, vest, gloves, and boots.
It has features to notify and let you monitor an area in real-time by setting up the device through this mobile application.
You can also generate report from the detections of the monitoring device.

All effort is taken to ensure that all information collected is informative and accurate as possible. Information collected from detection is secured and the monitoring system will give a copy of results to the safety officers for future reference.
This data privacy policy describe the monitoring device and explains the safeguards we have put in place to protect personal data of any individuals who may be captured by the monitoring device.

The collection, disclosure, use, storage, and other processing of personal data by the monitoring device is for references for verifying any violation/s of the workers and managing a safe environment for the workers, including without limitation:
\t- preventing removal of PPE\n\t- assisting safety officers to monitor non-compliance\n\t- for dispute-resolution purposes where images might be able to settle that dispute.
The monitoring device is not used for purposed other than those described above.
The monitoring device operating time during working hours.
The monitoring device captures image of any movement and person that is spotted in the area under surveillance.
The monitoring device do not conduct sound recording.
The placement of monitoring device shall not intrude the privacy of individual and the task of the workers.
Upon installation, the device is tested to ensure that only the working area are monitored.
The workers shall be notified of monitoring device operations through signage installed near the areas monitored.
Images captured by the Company is accessible only to the Safety and Security Team.

The personnel engaged to ensure the safety of the premises and/or the operation and maintenance of the monitoring device may have access to images only where strictly required to accomplish their task, and are prohibited from using the images for any other purposes.
Access to the images captured by the monitoring device is restricted and carefully controlled.
By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our
\t- \"Employer\" refers to the organization, company, or entity that employs you and has subscribed to the company\'s services.
\t- \"Mobile Application\" refers to the ZMCI Safety Monitoring App.
\t- \"Safety Personnel\" refers to individuals employed by the employer who have been granted access to use the mobile application.

By accessing or using the company\'s mobile application, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the mobile application.

The mobile application is intended solely for the use of safety personnel employed by the employer. It is not to be used by any unauthorized individuals or for any purposes other than those specified by the employer.

To access and use the mobile application, you may be required to register for an account. During the registration process, you must provide accurate and up-to-date information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and ensuring their security.

As a safety personnel user, you are authorized to use the mobile application for safety-related purposes in accordance with the guidelines provided by your employer. This may include accessing detection information, timely reports, and utilizing other features provided by the mobile application.
By using the mobile application, you agree to
\t- Comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
\t- Use the mobile application in a manner consistent with the company\'s guidelines and policies.
\t- Safeguard your account credentials and promptly report any unauthorized access or misuse of the mobile application.
\t- Refrain from engaging in any activity that may disrupt the proper functioning of the mobile application.

All intellectual property rights related to the mobile application and its content belong to the company, or their respective third-party licensors. You shall not reproduce, distribute, modify, or exploit any part of the mobile application without prior written consent from the company.

The company is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. The collection, use, storage, and sharing of your personal information will be governed by the company\'s privacy policy and applicable data protection laws.

The organization agrees to implement reasonable security measures to safeguard the personal information of its construction workers. This includes maintaining the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the data, as well as protecting it from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. The organization shall take necessary precautions to prevent any unauthorized access to the mobile application and the data stored within.

Either party may terminate this Agreement upon written notice if the other party materially breaches any of the obligations or terms set forth herein. Termination shall not relieve the organization of its responsibilities for the privacy and data protection of its construction workers.

To the extent permitted by applicable laws, the company shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use or inability to use the mobile application, including any errors or omissions in its content.

These terms of use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the Philippine laws. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these terms shall be resolved through negotiation in good faith. If a resolution cannot be reached, the parties agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the courts in the Philippines.

The organization or construction company reserves the right to modify or update these terms of use at any time. Any changes to the terms will be communicated to you through the mobile application or other appropriate means.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms of use or the mobile application, please contact us at zmci.company@gmail.com.
By accessing or using the mobile application, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms of use.

We are committed to protecting the privacy and personal information of construction workers who use our mobile application and utilize our device that detects personal protective equipment (PPE). This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard the personal information in accordance with applicable privacy laws and regulations.
We may collect personal information from construction workers, which may include:
\t- Personal protective equipment usage data and detection details.
The personal information collected is used for the following purposes:
\t- To detect compliance with personal protective equipment (PPE) requirements.
\t- To provide relevant reports and analytics to the subscribing organization (construction company).

The organization (construction company) subscribing to our services is responsible for ensuring the privacy and data protection of its construction workers in relation to the use of our services. This includes obtaining necessary consents, providing appropriate notice, and complying with applicable privacy laws and regulations.

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the personal information of construction workers from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. These measures include encryption, access controls, and data retention policies.

We may engage in providing services for the storage, processing, or analysis of the information collected. We ensure that these services adhere to adequate security and privacy standards to protect the personal information and comply with applicable privacy laws and regulations.

We retain the personal information of construction workers for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, or as required by law. The subscribing organization is responsible for establishing appropriate data retention policies in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

Construction workers may have certain rights regarding their personal information, including the right to access, rectify, restrict processing, and delete their personal information. The subscribing organization is responsible for facilitating the exercise of these rights and handling related inquiries or requests.

We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws and regulations. We will notify the subscribing organization of any material changes to the privacy policy through appropriate means.
If you have any questions, concerns, or inquiries regarding this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at zmci.company@gmail.com.

By accessing and using the mobile application, users represent and warrant that they are authorized by the Company to act on its behalf and that they have the authority to bind the Company to this Agreement. Users further acknowledge that they are responsible for ensuring that other employees or authorized individuals of the Company also comply with this Agreement.

These terms and agreement (the "Agreement") govern the use of our mobile application and the subscription to our device that detects personal protective equipment (PPE). By subscribing to our services, the organization (construction company) acknowledges and agrees to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement.

The organization agrees to subscribe to our mobile application and utilize our device for the purpose of detecting personal protective equipment (PPE) and monitor the compliance among its construction workers. The organization acknowledges that it is responsible for ensuring the privacy and data protection of its construction workers in relation to the use of our services.

The organization understands that the data captured by the device and processed through our services may include personal information of its construction workers, such as screenshot images, PPE usage data, and detection details. The organization agrees to comply with all applicable privacy laws, regulations, and industry standards in relation to the collection, processing, storage, and protection of these information.

The organization shall obtain any necessary consents from its construction workers for the use of the device and the processing of any information collected by it. It shall provide appropriate notice to the workers regarding the purpose, scope, and duration of the data collection and processing activities.

The organization acknowledges the importance of providing proper training and awareness to its employees regarding the collection, processing, and protection of personal information. It shall educate its employees on privacy best practices and ensure their adherence to applicable policies and procedures.

The organization agrees to indemnify and hold our company, its officers, employees, and affiliates, harmless from any claims, damages, liabilities, or expenses arising out of its failure to fulfill its responsibilities for the privacy and data protection of its construction workers.

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the Philippine laws. Any disputes arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in the Philippines.
